name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Quality Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building and optimizing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **EKS**, and implementing **GitOps** for agile development cycles. Strong background in **Chaos Engineering** through tools such as **Litmus**, **Chaos Mesh**, and **AWS Fault Injection Simulator** to enhance system resilience and performance. Skilled in monitoring and performance tuning with **CloudWatch**, **Prometheus**, and **HoneyComb**.

Experienced in developing both frontend and backend technologies including **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing MLOps strategies, including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring efficient model training and orchestration. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
